This is the homepage for CSCI 200 - Introduction to Machine Learning taught by Prof. Kim Mandery in January 2026 at St. Olaf College. All course materials will be posted on this site.

We will be using our Moodle page to [submit assignments](https://mdl.stolaf.edu/course/section.php?id=1379416) and host our class [discussion forum](https://mdl.stolaf.edu/mod/forum/view.php?id=514243)
